/family.title: The RaggieSoft Family
/family.description: A Personified DevOps ecosystem where every server and script has a name, a face, and a purpose.

/family/michael.title: Michael P. Ragsdale | The Architect
/family/michael.ogDescription: The only biological human in the loop. Creator of the Stardust Universe.

/family/paige.title: Paige | Literary Editor
/family/paige.ogDescription: Michael's favorite sister and designated Safe Person. She handles ingestion and emotional regulation.

/family/jessica.title: Jessica | Production Infrastructure
/family/jessica.ogDescription: The eldest sister. She runs the house and holds the keys to the infrastructure.

/family/sarah.title: Sarah | Deployment Guardian
/family/sarah.ogDescription: She watches the perimeter and performs atomic deployments while Michael sleeps.

/family/jenna.title: Jenna | Development & Sync
/family/jenna.ogDescription: Sarah's chaotic twin. She manages the workspace and syncs assets to the cloud.

/family/harper.title: Harper | Studio Engineer
/family/harper.ogDescription: High-energy and loud. Recursively finding WAV files and transcoding them for the web.

/family/amanda-elara.title: Amanda & Elara | Gateway
/family/amanda-elara.ogDescription: The Web Root and The Router. One holds the files, the other speaks the words.
